title: Site-wide brand color update: Jeevan green/teal â†’ Medical Blue

requirements.summary: Replace Jeevan green/teal brand accents with Medical Blue across light and dark themes site-wide.
acceptanceCriteria: All UI elements that previously rendered in the Jeevan teal/green (including `--jeevan-teal`, `--secondary`, and `--accent`) now render in Medical Blue in light mode.
All UI elements that previously rendered in the Jeevan teal/green now render in Medical Blue in dark mode.
There are no remaining noticeable green/teal accents in buttons, badges, icons, links hover states, or highlights across public pages and admin/doctor/phlebotomist sections.

file_operations.description: Update the global CSS theme variables so `--jeevan-teal` is set to Medical Blue (matching the intended brand blue) in both `:root` and `.dark`, ensuring all usages of `text-jeevan-teal`, `bg-jeevan-teal`, `border-jeevan-teal`, and `hover:*jeevan-teal*` render as Medical Blue without changing any read-only UI components.

requirements.summary: Update Tailwind-linked theme tokens (secondary/accent/chart colors) so utilities and charts no longer resolve to green/teal while preserving contrast/accessibility.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/index.css` theme variables are updated so secondary/accent and any chart colors that referenced the green/teal value no longer resolve to green.

All existing Tailwind classes (e.g., `text-jeevan-teal`, `bg-jeevan-teal`, `hover:text-jeevan-teal`, `hover:bg-jeevan-teal`) now visually display as Medical Blue without needing to edit immutable UI component sources.
No contrast/accessibility regressions are introduced (text remains readable on Medical Blue backgrounds and hover states).

file_operations.description: Change Tailwind-consumed tokens that currently use teal/green to Medical Blue: update `--secondary`, `--accent`, and any chart variables that reference teal/green (e.g., `--chart-2`, `--chart-4`) in both light and dark mode blocks; validate foreground tokens (`--secondary-foreground`, `--accent-foreground`) keep readable contrast after the color swap.

Confirm Tailwind color mappings remain consistent with the updated CSS variables (secondary/accent/chart and `jeevan-teal` all resolve via `oklch(var(--...))`); make any minimal adjustments needed so existing utility classes continue to point to the updated variables (no refactors of UI component sources).
